post.description: Initiate and send multipart/formdata file attachments and data to the specified URL. This API is created to support Logic apps as the HTTP request connector cannot correctly handle multipart/formdata

201.description: Successfully sent the attachments and request data.

400.description:
An error occured while processing the request. This could be due to any of the following.
- Missing attachmentUrl, apiUrl, filename, apiRequestHeaders or additionalParameters fields
- Incorrect attachmentUrl or apiUrl.

post.summary: POST attachments and data to the specified URL using multipart formdata

post.description: Return the skill execution results to bot using API server. This API is created mainly to support clients that cannot make HTTP POST requests to the returnResultURL.

parameters.description: Return Result URL - The absolute URL sent from Otto when the skill is triggered.

200.description: Successfully sent the result to the user.

400.description: One or more required property is missing from request body or is invalid.
